item.title: ORACLE CORP 10-K
item.description: ORACLE CORP, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 21, 2021 had 41372 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: oracle - 560 instances may - 502 instances cloud - 466 instances 2021 - 444 instances financial - 394 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
